mapper.sql: `symbol` AS symbol, `currency_id1` AS currencyId1, `currency_id2` AS currencyId2, `price_decimal_digits` AS priceDecimalDigits, `count_decimal_digits` AS countDecimalDigits, `min_buy_count` AS minBuyCount, `min_Buy_price` AS minBuyPrice, `min_buy_amount` AS minBuyAmount, `max_buy_count` AS maxBuyCount, `max_buy_amount` AS maxBuyAmount, `max_buy_price` AS maxBuyPrice, `status` AS status, `sort` AS sort, `create_time` AS createTime, `update_time` AS updateTime
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM t_currency_trade WHERE
`symbol` = #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
`currency_id1` = #{currencyId1,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND
`currency_id2` = #{currencyId2,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND
`price_decimal_digits` = #{priceDecimalDigits,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND
`count_decimal_digits` = #{countDecimalDigits,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND
`min_buy_count` = #{minBuyCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND
`min_Buy_price` = #{minBuyPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND
`min_buy_amount` = #{minBuyAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND
`max_buy_count` = #{maxBuyCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND
`max_buy_amount` = #{maxBuyAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND
`max_buy_price` = #{maxBuyPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND
`sort` = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND
`create_time` = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND
`update_time` = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
